Package com.leonteqsecurity.WholesaleFoodStore.Controllers

Class FoodStoreController

java.lang.Object
com.leonteqsecurity.WholesaleFoodStore.Controllers.FoodStoreController
@Controller public class FoodStoreController extends Object
Controller class for handling HTTP requests related to the Wholesale Food Store entities.
